dict.string:
-- This is v0.7 of the custom script for AlfredApp for iTerm 3.1.1+ -- created by Sinan Eldem www.sinaneldem.com.tr
on alfred_script(q) run script " on run {q} tell application \"iTerm\" set newWindow to (create window with default profile) tell current session of newWindow write text q end tell end tell end run " with parameters {q} end alfred_script
